body:
Comment 13: 
Sorry, again not a repro, but I did capture the full stack this time and wanted to get
it included in the report just in case there's something useful here.

Note that I'm still running the build from the previous changeset and I've disabled part
of my timeout logic (the one I was suspect of).  This means the remaining timeouts are
on the GET side and the PUT side of an individual request.  I'd be most suspicious at
this point of the read timeout on a PUT request.  I will start going down this path for
repro now (notice this one happened almost exactly 24 hours into a run).


[comment is too long...  http://pastebin.com/djEpGLpR ]
